text: Pasta al pomodoro () is an Italian food typically prepared with pasta, olive oil, fresh tomatoes, basil, and various other fresh ingredients. It is intended to be a quick light dish, rather than a dish in a heavy sauce. Pomodoro means "tomato" in Italian. ==See also== *Spaghetti alla puttanesca * List of pasta dishes * List of tomato dishes * ==References== Category:Italian cuisine Category:Pasta dishes Category:Tomato dishes
title: Pasta al pomodoro
